attributes.action: Ask Keith Vaz - Leicester East MP to resign over expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keith Vaz has claimed in excess of £80k of public money in just four years. This is by any stretch excessive. He should do the right thing and resign.

rejection.details: As PM, Gordon Brown cannot ask MPs to resign. This is a party/Parliamentary matter.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
